LanguageData.FT_Barrier.label: Concrete barrier
LanguageData.FT_Barrier.description: A solid concrete barrier, hinder the movement of vehicles and provide cover.
LanguageData.FT_BarrierDiagonal.label: Diagonal concrete barrier
LanguageData.FT_BarrierDiagonal.description: A solid concrete barrier, hinder the movement of vehicles and provide cover.
LanguageData.FT_Sandbag.label: Military sandbag
LanguageData.FT_Sandbag.description: Bags of locally-sourced dirt or sand, stacked for use as cover. More professional-looking than basic sandbags.
LanguageData.FT_TankTrap.label: Tank trap
LanguageData.FT_TankTrap.description: A solid concrete pillar meant to hinder the movement of vehicles.
LanguageData.FT_Tetrapods.label: Tetrapods
LanguageData.FT_Tetrapods.description: A solid concrete pillar designed to hinder naval landings.
LanguageData.FT_WallSandbag.label: Military sandbag wall
LanguageData.FT_WallSandbag.description: Bags of locally-sourced dirt or sand, stacked for use as wall.
